title: Linux uupick Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the uupick command to extract files from UUENCODE encoded emails and automate the process with shell scripts. Gain practical networking and communication skills.

meta.title: Linux uupick Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the uupick command to extract files from UUENCODE encoded emails and automate the process with shell scripts. Gain practical networking and communication skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, uupick, UUENCODE, email, file extraction, shell scripting, networking, communication

steps.title: Extracting Files from UUENCODE Encoded Emails

verify.name: Verify uupick command installation
verify.hint: Ensure that the sharutils package is installed and the uupick command is available.
